snippet: Former Gov. George E. Pataki announced his support of the billionaire supermarket owner John A. Catsimatidis for the Republican mayoral nomination and said he “isn’t a career politician.”
abstract: Former New York State Gov George E. Pataki announces his support of billionaire supermarket owner John A Catsimatidis for Republican mayoral nomination in New York City.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. George E. Pataki announced his support of the billionaire supermarket owner John A. Catsimatidis for the Republican mayoral nomination and said he “isn’t a career politician.”

headline.main: Pataki Endorses Catsimatidis in Race for Mayor
headline.print_headline: Pataki Endorses Catsimatidis in Race for Mayor
